DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study investigate efficacy mechanism bone marrow mononuclear cell ( BMMNC ) transplantation diabetic non-diabetic patient ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) undergo percutaneous coronary intervention ( PCI ) .
DOC.brief_title: Cell Therapy Diabetic Patients With ST-Segment Elevation Myocardial Infarction ( STEMI )
DOC.detailed_description: Stem cell capable important property self-renewal differentiation plasticity . Human autologous bone marrow mononuclear cell ( BMMNC ) contain CD34+ haematopoietic CD34- mesenchymal stem cell . Both cell type may contribute heart muscle repair acute myocardial infarction ( AMI ) . In recent year , variety clinical trial explore hypothesis BMMNC transplantation may enhance recovery leave ventricular function AMI . The use BMMNC clinically justify ethically unquestionable severe side effect report immunosuppressive therapy unnecessary . More , previous work show patient without diabetes may benefit BMMNC transplantation . Thus , aim present study investigate efficacy mechanism bone marrow mononuclear cell ( BMMNC ) transplantation diabetic non-diabetic patient ST-segment elevation myocardial infarction ( STEMI ) undergone PCI .
